items.sentence: I\'d like to read some books about the Beatles.
I\'d like to say a few words by way of apology.
I\'d like to stay here for as long as possible.
I\'d love to live in Australia for a few years.
Tom couldn\'t have done that without your help.
I\'m really looking forward to summer vacation.
I\'m sending you a birthday present by airmail.
I wish that it hadn\'t happened the way it did.
I wish you could\'ve seen the stars last night.
You\'re a lot younger than Tom is, aren\'t you?
